option-madrid-title: A trustworthy firm for your security.
grid-madrid-1-text: We cover both legal and economic practice in the Andorran and Spanish administrations.
grid-madrid-2-text: We have built a solid foundation in the legal sector with offices in Andorra and Madrid.
grid-madrid-3-text: At Mesas Trigo, we continue to move forward safely, adapting to the needs of our clients and market changes.
grid-madrid-4-text: We cling to the values defended by the firm since its inception. We are guided by the values of ethics, professionalism, and excellence.
grid-abogados-1-text: We have over 10 years of experience in the sector, fighting every day in a secure manner and focused on the needs of our clients.
grid-abogados-2-text: We defend the essence of the profession and the firm, maintaining care and excellence in every task.
grid-abogados-3-text: We work hand in hand with the client. We identify and interpret their needs to offer the best service.
grid-abogados-4-text: We are ethical and professional with the changes and unforeseen events that are to come.
grid-economistas-1-text: We work with a precise and rigorous approach to build reliable and long-lasting relationships.
grid-economistas-2-text: We offer services to both individuals and companies. We work to drive actions that deliver viable results.
grid-economistas-3-text: We advise and support you to fulfill the operations and requirements you need.
grid-economistas-4-text: We operate at the financial and legal level within the sports sector, as well as the entertainment industry.
